Title: Legacy of Tyr: Secrets of the Past
Description:
To stop Raszageth from freeing the other Incarnates, the Aspects' power must be restored.

But this will not be an easy task. The Titans are silent and Keeper Tyr is long dead.

Queen Alexstrasza has devised a plan. In the Badlands lies a Titan facility called Uldaman. She believes Tyr's companions hid a disc of his memories inside its depths.
 
Take your allies to Uldaman and find the disc for the Dragon Queen. Let us hope Tyr's knowledge can be used to re-empower the Aspects.
ObjectivesText: Enter Uldaman in Badlands. Discover the cause of the disturbances.
RewardText:
Infinite dragons? Their kind always has been troublesome.

I will inform the Dragon Queen that she must find another way to restore the power of the Aspects.
